meanings.definition: To shed tears as an expression of emotion.
meanings.sent1: When I am sad, I cry.
meanings.sent2: She will cry if she feels hurt.
meanings.sent3: The baby's cry made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her heart seemed to cry with each tear that fell.
meanings.sent5: The sound of her cry echoed through the room.

meanings.definition: A loud, inarticulate shout or scream.
meanings.sent1: The cry for help was heard by all.
meanings.sent2: His cry of pain pierced the silence.
meanings.sent3: The cry of the baby startled the cat.
meanings.sent4: The cry of the eagle filled the valley.
meanings.sent5: The cry of the crowd was deafening.

meanings.sent1: The bird's cry echoed in the forest.
meanings.sent2: His cry for attention was ignored.
meanings.sent3: The cry of victory rang through the stadium.
meanings.sent4: The cry of the wolf sent shivers down their spines.
meanings.sent5: The cry of the child brought his mother running.
